title: Through All the Long Dark Night
author: [unclear]

verses.text:
Through all the long dark night of years
The people walked in flame;
Unheeding voices, prophecies,
And warnings as they came.

But to an open ear and heart
The word of truth came down:
A light to lighten Gentile lands,
And lift the lowly crown.

No earthly splendors herald
The coming of the King;
No sound of trumpet-call announced
The Lord of everything.

A child upon his mother's breast,
A tender flower of love;
Yet He the everlasting arms
That bear the worlds above.
